frictionPoints.description: Tutorial takes 8 minutes - too long for experienced users who want to start immediately
frictionPoints.suggestedFix: Add 'Skip Tutorial' option for experienced users, or make tutorial interactive with actual tasks

frictionPoints.description: Power users frustrated by lack of keyboard shortcuts - forced to use mouse for everything
frictionPoints.suggestedFix: Implement keyboard shortcuts for common actions (add task, complete, search)

frictionPoints.description: Mobile app missing key features from web version - users can't organize tasks
frictionPoints.suggestedFix: Achieve feature parity between web and mobile for core workflows

frictionPoints.description: Sharing tasks requires too many clicks - 5 steps to invite a teammate
frictionPoints.suggestedFix: Simplify sharing flow - one-click invite with email autocomplete

valueMoments.description: Natural language task creation delighted users - 'Buy milk tomorrow' automatically parsed
Clean, uncluttered interface helped users focus - 'Finally a tool that doesn't overwhelm'
Reliable sync across devices gave users confidence - tasks always available
Fast response times (< 100ms) made app feel snappy and responsive

recommendations.action: Add 'Skip Tutorial' option for experienced users
recommendations.expectedImpact: Reduce onboarding friction for 60% of users

recommendations.action: Achieve mobile app feature parity with web
recommendations.expectedImpact: Improve satisfaction for 70% of mobile users

recommendations.action: Implement keyboard shortcuts for power users
Add referral incentives to improve viral coefficient
